name: VillaTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open villa trivia”
”Alexa, start villa trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: villa trivia
des: This is a trivia game for senior citizens who might be alone due to the pandemic. It's a great way to keep the mind moving, especially if you are confined to your room all day. The questions are not too hard and are mostly geared towards seniors.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
